description:
I’m very excited to announce my Partnership with @getplume this Pride month! 🏳️‍🌈
•
As many of you know I have moved from Oregon to Texas-
I also went from having health insurance in Oregon, to not having health insurance in Texas.
Which means the process of keeping my HRT Rx was difficult.
Finding a new Trans Knowledgeable Dr was difficult.
Affording the Dr visit and the lab work needed was difficult-
Until I learned about @getplume !
•
@getplume is a $99 a month subscription based At Home HRT company for 18+ individuals who need HRT, but don’t have access to it due to finances or a lack of Drs who are knowledgeable and affirming to the Transgender experience in their area.
•
I met with Dr. Jerrica, a Trans-Doctor, right on the @getplume app!
I filled out all the paperwork through the app, had a consult with Dr Jerrica right through the app, and have direct contact with Dr Jerrica for any questions and follow ups, via messaging through the app!
Not only was the process easeful, it was very understandable, accessible, and it just made me feel like a human being.
•
I’ll be hosting a LIVE each month with @getplume to answer questions, chat about their services and overall talk about what access to At Home HRT looks like for those who don’t have access!
Our first chat is Monday June 15th @ 1:15pm cst- 
If you have any topics or questions you’d like to have us address, drop them below!
•
•
•
•
*@getplume is currently available in the following states NC, VA, CA, CO, FL, TX, NY and will be launching MA, OR, ME on 6/15
#pridemonth #transpride #athomehrt #partner #informedconsent #trans #transgender #hrt #testosterone #ftm #mtf #nonbinary #aydiandowling #getplume #plume #accessibility #transcare #transhealthcare
